oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte-de-visite of William Preston Graves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of William Preston Graves (Febraury 2, 1841 - January 20, 1889) seated in uniform. Graves was a captain in the U.S. Army. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky, and died in Little Rock Barracks, Arkansas. He married Hetty Scott of Fredericksburg, Virginia, in 1874. H. D. Stowe of Louisville was the photographer. This image is a duplicate of the image included in nash264.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
